title: Standards Compliance
para: GNOME works closely with groups such as freedesktop.org to support interoperability and avoid proprietary lock-in.
Specifications supported in GNOME 2.2 include: CORBA, XML, Xdnd, EWMH, XEMBED, the system tray spec, XSETTINGS, icon themes, recent files, thumbnail management, and XSMP.
